nodes.text: A tattooist, or tattoo artist, was a person who drew tattoos on people's skin as a job. Notable examples were Bojam Rees, who made a living as a tattooist on Starstation 12 and the male Lafrarian Nuyu, a tattoo artist and body decorator who ran a small shop on StarForge Station. The Blue Sector of Corellia's capital Coronet hosted a high proportion of tattoo parlors.
